content.rendered:
Every summer Denver’s outdoor recreation facilities are filled with all kinds of activities ranging from team sports to picnics to general social gatherings. During the week of June 27th-July 3rd, the annual Colorado Sparklers Fastpitch Tournament comes to town to display the tremendous skill of youth girls’ softball. Bringing over 750 teams and over 30,000 coaches, players, and fans, this tournament is sure to amaze.

The Sparklers Tournament, held in the northwest Denver suburb of Westminster, CO at Christopher Complex, is a great time to get outside and witness why Colorado is such a great location to visit in the summertime. In addition to Denver, there are numerous amounts of activities to take participate in around Denver. For instance, in close by Idaho Springs there is rafting and ziplining trips that run every day to accommodate groups of all sizes. The rafting takes place on the Clear Creek which runs through this historic mining town and includes rapids suitable for beginners, intermediates and advanced rafters alike.

Located conveniently above the rafting outpost is our zipline course. Our zipline course consists of 6 different ziplines pieced together over cliffs, through trees, and over rivers. With great views of Idaho Springs and the surrounding area, this zipling course is tops in the area.

So if you’re in town for the Sparklers tournament, take a day to see the mountains and go on a rafting adventure or ziplining trip. We are also offering special deals and discounts for those taking part in the Sparklers Tournament. Give us a call today!
